answers.answer: umm could that be high blood pressure i would calla the doctor .

I would definitely call your doc! To have it constantly, is not good. First thing I thought of was high blood pressure as well. You definitely need to get that checked out.The other day I almost passed out, but it hasn't happened since. If things like dizziness, and clouded vision are happening too often, there could be something going on and hopefully your doc can give you more info.
It could also be gestational diabetes. Sounds a lot like my symptoms I had with my first baby. Most definitely call your doc and let them know what is going on.

I have had swelling too! mostly my legs and feet already. Good thing it is still cold here so i can wear pants and socks but it is starting to itch from the stretching. I haven't had the cloudy vision though... i think you need to talk to your doctor as well!

question: lately i have had a lot of swelling, so much so that ive had to take my rings and watch off and i have been getting white clouded vision along with dizzyness. it happened every day and its starting to get my down. I drink plenty of water and take it easy when i stand up but it keeps happening.Does vision change so much in pregnancy that your vision is constantly clouded?
title: swelling, dizzyness, white clouded vision
